meta.note: Transportation-focused bills tracked for IDOT Dashboard

HB-3289.title: Autonomous Vehicle Operations and Testing
HB-3289.summary: Establishes framework for autonomous vehicle testing and operation on Illinois public roads, including safety requirements, insurance standards, and oversight authority delegated to IDOT.

SB-1592.title: Connected and Autonomous Vehicle Insurance Requirements
SB-1592.summary: Defines insurance and liability coverage requirements for manufacturers and operators of connected and autonomous vehicles in Illinois.

HB-2156.title: IDOT Funding Modernization
HB-2156.summary: Modernizes IDOT funding mechanisms to include vehicle miles traveled (VMT) fees as supplement to traditional fuel tax revenue, enabling sustainable transportation infrastructure investment.

SB-847.title: EV Charging Infrastructure Development
SB-847.summary: Authorizes state grants for electric vehicle charging station deployment along major corridors and in underserved communities across Illinois.

HB-4521.title: Bridge Infrastructure Preservation Act
HB-4521.summary: Establishes dedicated funding stream for bridge inspection, maintenance, and replacement to ensure public safety and economic vitality in Illinois transportation network.

SB-2134.title: Public Transit Expansion and Modernization
SB-2134.summary: Allocates resources for public transit system expansion, vehicle fleet modernization, and accessibility improvements across Illinois regions.

HB-5678.title: Road Safety and Vision Zero Initiative
HB-5678.summary: Implements Vision Zero traffic safety strategies including improved intersection design, speed management, and safety audits for high-crash corridors.

SB-3301.title: Active Transportation and Multimodal Planning
SB-3301.summary: Requires IDOT and regional agencies to develop comprehensive multimodal transportation plans integrating bicycle, pedestrian, transit, and vehicle infrastructure.

HB-1847.title: Congestion Pricing Pilot Program
HB-1847.summary: Authorizes pilot congestion pricing program in Chicago metropolitan area to manage traffic, reduce emissions, and generate dedicated transportation revenue.

SB-556.title: Highway Safety Oversight and Accountability
SB-556.summary: Establishes safety metrics, performance standards, and accountability measures for IDOT to improve highway safety outcomes statewide.
